entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:16 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 then southwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:16 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
